Subject: content aware protection
Description: suddenly web browsing not working, for mac systems can you please take a remote session and check the issue.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Misconfigure the CAP policy based on the requirements of the policy
What_We_Know__c:
In the remote session: 
On MacOS - When they try to attach a file type from the deny list to Outlook - Web browser Chrome, it is getting blocked.
The customer does not know how to configure a CAP policy.
Next_Steps__c:
Explain to the customer how the CAP policy works.
Help him configure the CAP policy based on what he is trying to achieve.
Solution_Comment__c:
Explained to the customer how the CAP policy works.
Helped him configure the CAP policy based on what he is trying to achieve.
After deselecting the Chrome Browser from the Exit points, the requested file could be successfully uploaded in Webmail Outlook from the Chrome browser.
